page.title: 14CHESTERTON-LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The village of Chesterton and the surrounding area is patrolled under the official police duties of Gaydon Police House.However there is also cover from Harbury Police Station.On the occasions when Chesterton Windmill is open to the public for viewing and fundraising,the police line the approach roads with no waiting signs to avoid conjestion.Over the years, several of the main roads near the village have been slightly re-routed in order to eliminate dangerous bends and to ensure maximum safety for traffic and pedestrians.The now derelict Mill House,was used in the late seventeenth century as the Magistrates Courts for the Petty Sessional Division of Kingston and Chesterton,and the local landowner was the Justice of the Peace.
